description:
The third season of Koihime Musou.

Han's high court general Kashin (何進) was forced to swallow a cursed pill from Chou Jou. The effect is slowly turning her into a cat, which she dislikes. Chou Jou also made use of the emperor's name to dispose her from the Han court as a traitor.

She met Kada during her escape while Kada brought her to the Touka village, whom he believes they would help her.

Kyaroru in "Everybody's Tennis" (VG)  
Sayaka Hozumi in "Yoake Mae Yori Ruri Iro Na" (Visual Novel)

Hometown: Nara, Japan      Hobbies:  Reading  Watching movies    Also Known as: Kana Nojima (乃嶋 架菜）    Non-Anime Role:  Mafuyu Orifushi in "Kanojo x Kanojo x Kanojo Sanshimaitono Dokidoki Kyoudou" (Visual Novel)  Sousou Moutoku (Karin) in "Koihime Musou" (Visual Novel)   Sousou Moutoku (Karin) in "Shin Koihime Musou" (Visual Novel)  Sousou Moutoku (Karin) in "Shin Koihime Musou Character Song Vol. 1 - Ryuubi x Sousou" (Drama CD)

Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/a112132y) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%B5%A4%E5%8F%B8%E5%BC%93%E5%A6%83)__

She is a voice actress currently affiliated with Starlight Pro. She is well-known for her roles in adult games under pseudonym Satou Yuki, Akashi Yuki, and Fuyuki Mizuho.

BaseSon is one of the partner companies of Nexton, which specializes in the publishing and distribution of visual novel video games.  Past Works: Shin Koihime Musou -Otome Tairan- Shin Koihime Musou Koihime Musou Harukoi Otome 夕緋ノ向コウ側 屍姫と羊と嗤う月－cry for the moon－ One: Kagayaku Kisetsu e

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamada_uk) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/22HS_drill/) Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/). Works outside anime: - Melty Blood: Type Lumina (Video Game, 2021) (Cut-in Animation Character Design, Animation Director, Key Animation)

[Website](https://twitter.com/LoveLoveDragon) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LoveLoveDragon) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/masamiokui/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/okui-masami/)

Masami Okui is a J-Rock/J-Pop singer who was born in Itami, Hyōgo Prefecture. She began her professional musical career at age 21 as a concert backup singer.

From almost the very beginning of her career, Masami has sung themes for anime tv and movies. She is especially well known for her songs from Revolutionary Girl Utena, Slayers, Sorcerer Hunters, Di Gi Charat, Magic User's Club, Jungle de Ikou, Akihabara Dennou Gumi, Ray the Animation, He Is My Master and Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters. She has performed material for more than 50 singles and 20 albums to date (including her work with JAM Project and Chihiro Yonekura).
